snippet: The long-expected appointment of the aide, Ron Dermer, had raised concerns in Washington because of Mr. Dermer’s ties to Republicans, but he has since won over many in the White House.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu names one of his closest advisers, Ron Dermer, to be Israel’s next ambassador to the United States; long-anticipated appointment raises concerns in Washington due to Dermer’s ties to Republicans, but several in Obama administration say they are glad to have ambassador in Netanyahu's inner circle.
lead_paragraph: The long-expected appointment of the aide, Ron Dermer, had raised concerns in Washington because of Mr. Dermer’s ties to Republicans, but he has since won over many in the White House.

headline.main: Netanyahu Names Adviser Israeli Ambassador to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Names Adviser Israeli Ambassador to U.S.
